body.name: DaTerra Cucina Professional 11 Inch Nonstick Frying Pan with Lid | Italian Made Ceramic Sauté Pan, Chefs Non Stick Skillet for Cooking, Sizzling, Searing, Baking and More
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 3 mins
FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 16 hrs 33 mins
features: Superior Performance: Italian made frying pan nonstick, nontoxic, scratch resistant with cool-touch silicone is oven safe to 450 degrees Fahrenheit. Our 4-layer design allows our non-stick frying pan to heat up rapidly, evenly distribute temperature & will not peel off. Take pride in knowing this pan heats evenly and makes all your food look and taste better. Great for meat, fish, poultry, veal, pork chops, and eggs for omelets.

Best Nonstick Frying Pan That Lasts: Vesuvio Ceramic Cookware features a revolutionary, proprietary, 5th generation non-stick ceramic coating that is vastly stronger and more durable than previous ceramic coatings on the market. 4x the layers of safe PFOA-free premium nonstick make this pan incredibly durable, easy to cook with, and most importantly, easy to clean for years.

No Harmful Chemicals: Our nonstick pan contains no PTFE, PFOA, Lead, or Cadmium. DaTerra Cucina flat-bottom frying pans are artisan-made with a patented, all natural, multilayer nonstick coating that will last for years – and an airtight see through glass and silicone lid is included. Dishwasher safe with liquid detergent, hand wash recommended.

Versatile & Easy to Clean: Natural Gas? Electric? Glasstop? Propane? They are all the perfect partners to our PTFE free chefs pan. You can easily cook like a pro no matter where you are! Hate cleaning pots and pans? We do too. Which is why our non stick pan is made with a durable ceramic coating to ensure easy cleaning that will leave your non stick skillet pan looking new for life.

DaTerra Cucina's Promise: If all other ceramic coated frying pans have failed to deliver the cooking experience you've been searching for, then you’ll feel relieved to know that ours isn't just some gimmick – it’s tried, tested, and proven to cook, sear and sizzle any dish. Welcome to the family!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great pan, great quality
reviews.reviewText: If we could give this a 10 star ⭐ we would. We ordered this pan and another more expensive pan and this pan is by far the best. It's very easy to clean. While cooking, nothing sticks to the pan. I mean if there is, it's very very minimal and when cleaning this pan, anything left behind will wipe right off with no effort what so ever. This pan is light weight. That was one thing I notice when I purchase pans. The weight of the pan and this one is not heavy what so ever, even though looking at it, you might think it's heavy.The lid has a nice and good seal on it. That too is light weight. Not to mention the eco-friendly materials were used to produce this pan. Huge plus for us. You will enjoy a cool-touch silicone handle. I can't tell you how many times I have burned my hand when I needed to quickly grab a pan. With this pan, you will not have to worry about that.Seller gives a 1-Year Warranty, which means they stand behind their products. These pans are definitely premium and we can not wait until they come out with more sizes. I'm going to try to hold out on buying pans until Summer, when they should have new sizes.❤️️ PROS:east to cleanlight weightsturdyhigh quality1-Year Warranty💔 CONS:i don't see any cons with this pan what so ever

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ceramic, non stick goodness
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size, study lid, heats quickly and cooks evenly, has a ceramic, non-stick surface that is great even with eggs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love this pan wrote about it in my 13" review.
reviews.reviewText: It's super easy to clean! The best lid design to protecy the pan and the glass I have ever seen! It is silent too no loud lids! I was super scared to use it the first time. I'm always burning myself, and I have a problem with dropping stuff sometimes. I wondered how that little piece of rubber was gonna save my fingers. It indeed did just need to pay attention to my knuckles when I let go of it, not the company's fault by any means! Sometimes I just use a pot holder and sit it upside down with it while I'm fixing the pot. It does get hot if you plan on holding it for a long time and you had the heat up. Thats anything really. There are more on her Christmas list this year. Last year the brand was a surprise this year she knows exactly what she's getting! Awesome pans!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am very much in love with this pan already
reviews.reviewText: I received this piece December 30, and have already used it several times over the weekend. I am very much in love with this pan already! First, the pan is beautiful and the lid has a very contemporary look. Second, the pan is light weight, but seems to be very sturdy and appears to be well constructed. Most importantly, the food comes out of the pan so easy! Just in the last 3 days I have cooked sausage patties, fried eggs, seared meat, and sauteed veggies. The pan is light enough to comfortably flip food, and the non stick allowed the eggs to glide right out of the pan with out the use of oils. The pan heats up quick and cooks evenly. When I seared the meat, I noticed I was getting the crust on the meat and the brown bits in the pan. If I were to have deglazed, the good stuff would have been there (unlike a teflon). In this case it wiped out like a dream!!The lid that comes with the pan is also a nice part of this pan. The lip seats well and can also be used in the oven.Clean up was a breeze! I wiped out the pan and it is ready to go again! This was like my well seasoned cast iron pans, but so much more light weight!I am pretty sure I am going to love this pan!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nonstick for short time
reviews.reviewText: It was my all-time favorite pan for about three months. Then food began to stick and was very very hard, if not impossible, to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Updated.... it WAS a solid frying pan - works exactly as advertised. Would buy again in a heartbeat. (not anymore)
reviews.reviewText: 6 Month Update - Let down.After using this pan for 6 months, I've found it to lack almost all of the non stick qualities it had when I received it. I have hand washed with soft sponge only since having this pan. Eggs now stick every time, unless I use scads of olive oil in the pan, which for me defeats the purpose of non-stick, healthier eating. For the money, I'd say not worth it. Hoping this is a defect. Will attempt to make contact with the company about their 1 year warranty. Maybe this pan is the exception. Would love to try another.____Original Post:Solid product. Lives up to its claims....so far. I'd like to do a 6 month/12 month check in to see how the ceramic is holding up. This has always been the biggest point of failure for all "non-stick" pans that I use.Works exactly as advertised. Easy to cook with. Non-stick ceramic is a breeze to clean. This is used almost daily for meal prep. The lid works well. I was worried a "U" shaped handle wouldn't feel sturdy - I was wrong; it's very sturdy. Silicone outer edge was a nice touch. I would love to see this in a >= 12" pan, but I was willing to make the sacrifice since it seemed like the best option out there. If I was really being picky, I would love to see a bit more metal in the bottom of the pan...to help even out temperatures and keep it from cooling down too much as I add items in to cook. I hope this company continues to make more products like this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2017
reviews.reviewText: I have the 11" & 9 1/2" versions of this pan. This pan is a truly non-stick pan. It is amazing. I have cooked cheese, super low fat ground beef, as well as other items that generally stick to pans and not only do they not stick to this one, but clean up is a breeze. Cooking is even. I used my larger pan for a difficult stir fry dish that usually burns in other pans and I had no trouble, because the heat is evenly distributed with this pan. The handles do not get too hot. These look good too. These are a bit pricier than other non-stick pans, but you won't be replacing them a year later. So worth it! If you like to cook and want a non-stick pan, this is the one to get. Also, they aren't too heavy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like this pan because of its light weight which just fits our need perfectly but it get sticky after a couple weeks of use, but I would still recommend it to someone who prefers a light weight frying pan.
Perfect non stick pan. It’s a great size with a very secure lid.
Empfohlen von Anthony William, jeden Cent wert.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 24, 2018
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the 24 inch pan and was so impressed that I ordered the 28 inch as well. These pans are truly NON-STICK. The person who managed to make food stick to their pan must be a magician, because it is impossible if you cook like a normal person. I have already told all my friends that these are a MUST in every kitchen.
Pfanne ist verbogen., sodass der Deckel nicht schließt. Schade. Sie war auch nicht gut verpackt.
Best nonstick frying pan I have ever used.
